item.description:
EVENT: Join us for a mellow and scenic hike within 90 mins. of Boston. We’ll hike ~3 hrs., 4-5 miles, some uphill, rewarded with a great view. TC based on the day’s conditions will decide destination. Extreme weather will modify, but only serious rain will cancel. If you have not hiked recently, please call or e-mail the trip coordinator (TC) early.
RSVP: by previous Thursday to the the TC's address listed below BRING / WEAR: Hiking boots highly recommended as well as warm clothes, rain jacket, trail lunch/snacks and full water bottles.
TC: Gary mosaictrip6@averagebear.us
MEET: Email TC, west of Boston area carpool meeting time will be 9 AM.
COST: Carpooling, snack money, plus $5 for nonmembers
item.how_to_find_us: Contact the trip's coordinator (TC) for the details

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Mountain Mystery Tour
